      BehaviourBuilder BehaviourBuilder.after(long delay)
      Specify a delay for execution of the behaviours consumer.

      Creates a new behaviour builder.

      Specify an interval which will occur between executions of the behaviours consumer.
      BehaviourBuilder BehaviourBuilder.repeating(int times)
      Specify the times the behaviour should execute its consumer before flagging for destruction.

      Specify the priority of the behaviour that will be built.
